checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.complianceText: By checking this box, I confirm that I am purchasing these peptides strictly for in-vitro research and laboratory use only. I acknowledge these products are not approved for human consumption, therapeutic use, or clinical applications. I understand that I am responsible for compliance with all applicable federal and provincial Canadian regulations.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Research-grade peptides with fast availability and streamlined ordering
about.mission_text_1: Royal Peptides is a trusted Canada-based provider of research-grade peptides serving customers nationwide. Our mission is to deliver premium, high-purity peptides with fast, discreet shipping and unbeatable reliability.
about.mission_text_2: We combine scientific rigor with efficient operations to support your research needs with confidence and clarity.
about.how_it_works_subtitle: A streamlined process from browsing to delivery
about.step_1_desc: Browse the catalogue and stacks with clear categories, availability, and product pages.
about.step_2_desc: Stock status is shown clearly so you can choose with confidence before checkout.
about.step_3_desc: Place your order and follow the Interac e-Transfer instructions shown after checkout.
about.step_4_desc: Orders are processed carefully and tracking is provided when available.
about.why_customers_subtitle: Professional service built on trust and transparency
about.pillar_1_desc: Straightforward stock status and product visibility.
about.pillar_2_desc: Consistent product pages designed for fast research browsing.
about.pillar_3_desc: Packaging designed to stay low-profile during delivery.
about.pillar_4_desc: Interac e-Transfer instructions shown after checkout.
about.pillar_5_desc: Help when you need it — clear next steps.
about.pillar_6_desc: International shipping available; timing varies by destination.
about.faq_stock_q: How do you handle out-of-stock items?
about.faq_stock_a: Stock availability is displayed in real-time on every product page. Out-of-stock items are clearly marked, and you can only purchase items that are currently available. We update inventory continuously to ensure accuracy.
about.faq_ship_international_a: Yes. We ship internationally. Shipping perks and promotions may vary by destination.
about.faq_payment_q: What payment methods do you accept?
about.faq_payment_a: At the moment, we only support Interac e-Transfer. Instructions are shown after checkout.
about.faq_packaging_a: All orders are shipped in discreet, unmarked packaging with no external indication of contents. Products are securely packed to ensure safe transit and maintain product integrity.
about.faq_tracking_q: Will I receive order confirmation and tracking?
about.faq_tracking_a: Yes. You will receive an order confirmation immediately after purchase, followed by a shipping notification with tracking information once your order is dispatched (typically within 24 hours).
about.faq_support_a: Our support team typically responds to inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters, we prioritize quick resolution and clear communication.
about.faq_discounts_a: Yes. Automatic tiered discounts apply at checkout: 10% off orders over $300 and 15% off orders over $500. No codes needed—discounts are applied automatically.
about.faq_peptides_a: All our peptides are lyophilized, quality-controlled, and stored properly. We provide clear product information, proper labeling, and maintain strict handling standards throughout the fulfillment process.
about.research_only_p1: All peptides supplied by Royal Peptides are manufactured and distributed strictly for in-vitro research applications and laboratory use only. These products are not approved for human consumption, therapeutic use, or clinical applications.
about.research_only_p2: Our peptides are intended for qualified researchers, academic institutions, and licensed laboratories conducting scientific studies. By purchasing, you acknowledge compliance with all applicable Canadian federal and provincial regulations.
about.research_only_p3: We do not make any therapeutic claims about our products. Royal Peptides operates in full compliance with Health Canada guidelines for research chemical distribution.
about.ready_subtitle: Explore our complete catalogue or discover curated research stacks

shipping.title: Shipping & Returns
shipping.subtitle: Shipping policies, timelines, and returns
shipping.canada_desc: Free shipping on $300+ orders to Canada. Estimated delivery: 2-5 business days.
shipping.international_desc: We ship internationally. Times and fees vary by destination.
shipping.processing_desc: Orders are processed within 24 hours. Tracking provided when available.
shipping.returns_desc: Due to the nature of research peptides, we only accept returns for damaged or incorrect products. Contact support within 48 hours of receipt.

footer.research_use_only: Research use only. Not intended for human consumption.
footer.researchUseWarning: Research use only. Not intended for human consumption.
